summary: A collection of client‑side authentication utilities for the Feast permissions service, handling token acquisition, caching, and automatic injection of bearer tokens into outgoing gRPC, Arrow Flight, and HTTP requests via interceptors and wrappers.
business_intent: Enable Feast SDK components to securely communicate with the permissions API using configurable authentication mechanisms (OIDC, Kubernetes service‑account, intra‑service) while abstracting token management and renewal.
